mdRecord.dcterms:title: [Charlestown Promontory, the ruins of the town after the Battle of Bunker Hill and General Howe's encampment]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ink and watercolor manuscript panoramic view depicting the area around Boston during the siege after the Battle of Bunker Hill, as seen from Beacon Hill.
